content.content:
1â†’import * as React from "react"
     2â†’import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
     3â†’import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"
     4â†’
     5â†’import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     6â†’
     7â†’const buttonVariants = cva(
     8â†’  "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0",
     9â†’  {
    10â†’    variants: {
    11â†’      variant: {
    12â†’        default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90",
    13â†’        destructive:
    14â†’          "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90",
    15â†’        outline:
    16â†’          "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    17â†’        secondary:
    18â†’          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
    19â†’        ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
    20â†’        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
    21â†’      },
    22â†’      size: {
    23â†’        default: "h-10 px-4 py-2",
    24â†’        sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3",
    25â†’        lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8",
    26â†’        icon: "h-10 w-10",
    27â†’      },
    28â†’    },
    29â†’    defaultVariants: {
    30â†’      variant: "default",
    31â†’      size: "default",
    32â†’    },
    33â†’  }
    34â†’)
    35â†’
    36â†’export interface ButtonProps
    37â†’  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    38â†’    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
    39â†’  asChild?: boolean
    40â†’}
    41â†’
    42â†’const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
    43â†’  ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
    44â†’    const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    45â†’    return (
    46â†’      <Comp
    47â†’        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
    48â†’        ref={ref}
    49â†’        {...props}
    50â†’      />
    51â†’    )
    52â†’  }
    53â†’)
    54â†’Button.displayName = "Button"
    55â†’
    56â†’export { Button, buttonVariants }
    57â†’

But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
